instructions: If you have a Skype shortcut on your homescreen, tap and hold it, then move your finger up the screen. You'll see two options: Remove and Uninstall. Drag the app to Uninstall. You'll get a pop-up message that says "Do you want to uninstall this app?" Tap OK . If you don't have a shortcut on your homescreen, go to Settings . Tap Apps & notifications . Tap See all apps . Scroll down to Skype and tap it. Tap Uninstall . You'll get a pop-up message that says "Do you want to uninstall this app?" Tap OK . If you need to, you can install Skype for Android again.
